text: Arau yisakale kupharai karae sihamtara amalasamuha maraubhumira maraicikara darae, trsnatura byaktiye yitoka pani buli bharae, kintu yetiya si se'itora kasata yaya tata ekoke napaya, baram tata allahakahe paya, eteke te'om taka tara hicapa purnamatraata pradana karaiba; arau allaha drauta hicapa grahanakarai
